item.title: Red, Red, LG Vu Wine
item.description: Everyone enjoys a nice wine with dinner, but what about in business or on the go? It’s perfectly acceptable when that “wine” is the new touchscreen phone available from AT&T. This “red wine” phone boasts more features than a full-bodied Cabernet. Its compact size of 4.3 x 2.1 x 0.5 inches makes it easy to carry in your pocket or bag. You read that correctly â€“ this device is only half an inch thin!
